RBCFTools 1.23-0.0.3.1.9000

RBCFTools: 'BCFTools', 'libbcftools' and 'htslib' Wrappers and 'BCF'/'VCF' to 'Parquet' Convertors

Source: R/RBCFTools-package.R
RBCFTools-package.Rd

Bundles the 'htslib' and 'bcftools' libraries and command lines tools for reading and manipulating VCF/BCF files. Includes streaming facilities from VCF to Apache Arrow via 'nanoarrow', enabling export to Arrow IPC format and Parquet format using 'duckdb' including a 'bcf_reader' extension. Utilities for reading and writing VCF/BCF files into 'DuckLake' provided.

See also
